name: Ascender (itch) (petermoyle)
description:
Keyboard Controls: Arrows - Left, Right.  Shoot:S.  Thrust: Spacebar 

Ascend from the depths of the abyss in this original 8-BIT style arcade game.

Navigate through challenging terrain and defeat enemies while trying not to overheat your engine.

This simple arcade game will have your heart pumping as you approach the next checkpoint.

Features:
- Retro arcade graphics and sound
- 1000m of level design to ascend
- Easy to use mobile controls
- Quick start checkpoints every 100m
- Lovable enemies to defeat

NO ads, NO In App purchases, Completely FREE.
